016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.util;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.*;
019import jakarta.faces.FactoryFinder;
020import jakarta.faces.application.Application;
021import jakarta.faces.application.ApplicationFactory;
022import jakarta.faces.component.UIViewRoot;
023import jakarta.faces.lifecycle.LifecycleFactory;
024import jakarta.faces.render.RenderKitFactory;
025import lombok.Getter;
026import lombok.Setter;
027import org.apache.myfaces.test.config.ResourceBundleVarNames;
028import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.*;
029import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.lifecycle.MockLifecycle;
030import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.lifecycle.MockLifecycleFactory;
031
032import java.net.URL;
033import java.net.URLClassLoader;
034
035/**
036 * Replacement for MyFaces
037 * {@link org.apache.myfaces.test.base.junit4.AbstractJsfTestCase}, where the
038 * code is initially taken from
039 *
040 * @author Oliver Wolff
041 */
042public class JsfRuntimeSetup {
043
044    @Getter
045    @Setter
046    private Application application = null;
047
048    @Getter
049    @Setter
050    private MockServletConfig config = null;
051
052    @Getter
053    @Setter
054    private MockExternalContext externalContext = null;
055
056    @Getter
057    @Setter
058    private MockFacesContext facesContext = null;
059
060    @Getter
061    @Setter
062    private MockFacesContextFactory facesContextFactory = null;
063
064    @Getter
065    @Setter
066    private MockLifecycle lifecycle = null;
067
068    @Getter
069    @Setter
070    private MockLifecycleFactory lifecycleFactory = null;
071
072    @Getter
073    @Setter
074    private MockRenderKit renderKit = null;
075
076    @Getter
077    @Setter
078    private MockHttpServletRequest request = null;
079
080    @Getter
081    @Setter
082    private MockHttpServletResponse response = null;
083
084    @Getter
085    @Setter
086    private CuiMockServletContext servletContext = null;
087
088    @Getter
089    @Setter
090    private MockHttpSession session = null;
091
092    // Thread context class loader saved and restored after each test
093    private ClassLoader threadContextClassLoader = null;
094    private boolean classLoaderSet = false;
095
096    /**
097     * <p>
098     * Set up instance variables required by this test case.
099     * </p>
100     */
101    public void setUp() {
102        // Set up a new thread context class loader
103        setUpClassloader();
104
105        // Set up Servlet API Objects
106        setUpServletObjects();
107
108        // Set up JSF API Objects
109        FactoryFinder.releaseFactories();
110
111        setFactories();
112
113        setUpJSFObjects();
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * <p>
118     * Tear down instance variables required by this test case.
119     * </p>
120     */
121    public void tearDown() {
122        application = null;
123        config = null;
124        externalContext = null;
125        if (facesContext != null) {
126            facesContext.release();
127        }
128        facesContext = null;
129        lifecycle = null;
130        lifecycleFactory = null;
131        renderKit = null;
132        request = null;
133        response = null;
134        servletContext = null;
135        session = null;
136        FactoryFinder.releaseFactories();
137        ResourceBundleVarNames.resetNames();
138
139        tearDownClassloader();
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Set up the thread context classloader. JSF uses the this classloader in order
144     * to find related factory classes and other resources, but in some selected
145     * cases, the default classloader cannot be properly set.
146     */
147    private void setUpClassloader() {
148        threadContextClassLoader = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader();
149        Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(new URLClassLoader(new URL[0], this.getClass().getClassLoader()));
150        classLoaderSet = true;
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * <p>
155     * Setup JSF object used for the test. By default it calls to the following
156     * methods in this order:
157     * </p>
158     *
159     * <ul>
160     * <li><code>setUpExternalContext();</code></li>
161     * <li><code>setUpLifecycle();</code></li>
162     * <li><code>setUpFacesContext();</code></li>
163     * <li><code>setUpView();</code></li>
164     * <li><code>setUpApplication();</code></li>
165     * <li><code>setUpRenderKit();</code></li>
166     * </ul>
167     */
168    private void setUpJSFObjects() {
169        setUpExternalContext();
170        setUpLifecycle();
171        setUpFacesContext();
172        setUpView();
173        setUpApplication();
174        setUpRenderKit();
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * <p>
179     * Setup servlet objects that will be used for the test:
180     * </p>
181     *
182     * <ul>
183     * <li><code>config</code> (<code>MockServletConfig</code>)</li>
184     * <li><code>servletContext</code> (<code>MockServletContext</code>)</li>
185     * <li><code>request</code> (<code>CuiMockHttpServletRequest</code></li>
186     * <li><code>response</code> (<code>MockHttpServletResponse</code>)</li>
187     * <li><code>session</code> (<code>CuiMockHttpSession</code>)</li>
188     * </ul>
189     */
190    private void setUpServletObjects() {
191        servletContext = new CuiMockServletContext();
192        config = new MockServletConfig(servletContext);
193        session = new CuiMockHttpSession(servletContext);
194        request = new CuiMockHttpServletRequest();
195        request.setHttpSession(session);
196        request.setServletContext(servletContext);
197        response = new MockHttpServletResponse();
198    }
199
200    /**
201     * <p>
202     * Set JSF factories using FactoryFinder method setFactory.
203     * </p>
204     */
205    private void setFactories() {
206        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.APPLICATION_FACTORY,
207            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockApplicationFactory");
208        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.FACES_CONTEXT_FACTORY,
209            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockFacesContextFactory");
210        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.LIFECYCLE_FACTORY,
211            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.lifecycle.MockLifecycleFactory");
212        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.RENDER_KIT_FACTORY, "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockRenderKitFactory");
213        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.EXCEPTION_HANDLER_FACTORY,
214            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockExceptionHandlerFactory");
215        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.PARTIAL_VIEW_CONTEXT_FACTORY,
216            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockPartialViewContextFactory");
217        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.VISIT_CONTEXT_FACTORY,
218            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.visit.MockVisitContextFactory");
219        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.CLIENT_WINDOW_FACTORY,
220            "org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockClientWindowFactory");
221        // Cui Extensions
222        FactoryFinder.setFactory(FactoryFinder.SEARCH_EXPRESSION_CONTEXT_FACTORY,
223            CuiMockSearchExpressionContextFactory.class.getName());
224    }
225
226    /**
227     * Setup the <code>externalContext</code> variable, using the servlet variables
228     * already initialized.
229     */
230    private void setUpExternalContext() {
231        externalContext = new MockExternalContext(servletContext, request, response);
232    }
233
234    /**
235     * Setup the <code>lifecycle</code> and <code>lifecycleFactory</code> variables.
236     */
237    private void setUpLifecycle() {
238        lifecycleFactory = (MockLifecycleFactory) FactoryFinder.getFactory(FactoryFinder.LIFECYCLE_FACTORY);
239        lifecycle = (MockLifecycle) lifecycleFactory.getLifecycle(LifecycleFactory.DEFAULT_LIFECYCLE);
240    }
241
242    /**
243     * Setup the <code>facesContextFactory</code> and <code>facesContext</code>
244     * variable. Before end, by default it override <code>externalContext</code>
245     * variable from the value retrieved from facesContext.getExternalContext(),
246     * because sometimes it is possible facesContext overrides externalContext
247     * internally.
248     */
249    private void setUpFacesContext() {
250        facesContextFactory = (MockFacesContextFactory) FactoryFinder.getFactory(FactoryFinder.FACES_CONTEXT_FACTORY);
251        facesContext = (MockFacesContext) facesContextFactory.getFacesContext(servletContext, request, response,
252            lifecycle);
253        if (facesContext.getExternalContext() != null) {
254            externalContext = (MockExternalContext) facesContext.getExternalContext();
255        }
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * By default, create an instance of UIViewRoot, set its viewId as "/viewId" and
260     * assign it to the current facesContext.
261     */
262    private void setUpView() {
263        UIViewRoot root = new CuiMockUIViewRoot();
264        root.setViewId("/viewId");
265        root.setRenderKitId(RenderKitFactory.HTML_BASIC_RENDER_KIT);
266        facesContext.setViewRoot(root);
267    }
268
269    /**
270     * Setup the <code>application</code> variable and before the end by default it
271     * is assigned to the <code>facesContext</code> variable, calling
272     * <code>facesContext.setApplication(application)</code>
273     */
274    private void setUpApplication() {
275        var applicationFactory = (ApplicationFactory) FactoryFinder.getFactory(FactoryFinder.APPLICATION_FACTORY);
276        application = applicationFactory.getApplication();
277        facesContext.setApplication(application);
278    }
279
280    /**
281     * Setup the <code>renderKit</code> variable. This is a good place to use
282     * <code>ConfigParser</code> to register converters, validators, components or
283     * renderkits.
284     */
285    private void setUpRenderKit() {
286        var renderKitFactory = (RenderKitFactory) FactoryFinder.getFactory(FactoryFinder.RENDER_KIT_FACTORY);
287        renderKit = new MockRenderKit();
288        renderKitFactory.addRenderKit(RenderKitFactory.HTML_BASIC_RENDER_KIT, renderKit);
289    }
290
291    private void tearDownClassloader() {
292        if (classLoaderSet) {
293            Thread.currentThread().setContextClassLoader(threadContextClassLoader);
294            threadContextClassLoader = null;
295            classLoaderSet = false;
296        }
297    }
298}
